import { Props, Story, Preview } from "@storybook/addon-docs/blocks";
import { Tabs } from "../../../Components/Molecules";

# Tabs

`import { Tabs } from "@elevenia/master-ui/Components/Molecules";`

`Tabs` component navigate between views. Line under `Tabs` header indicates which view is currently active.

<Preview>
  <Story id="molecules-tabs--0-tabs" />
</Preview>

## Stories

### Long Tabs
Long Tabs variant makes tabs scrollable if tabs total width exceed container or device width.
`longTabs` props also required to activate this variant.

<Preview>
  <Story id="molecules-tabs-long-tabs--0-long-tabs" />
</Preview>

## Component Props

### underlineSize
`underlineSize` props set the thickness of line under tab.

<Preview>
  <Story id="molecules-tabs--underline-size" />
</Preview>

### underlineColor
`underlineColor` props set the color of line under tab.
The value can be a color hex or [this color pallete](/?path=/docs/utils-color--list).

<Preview>
  <Story id="molecules-tabs--underline-color" />
</Preview>

### dots
`dots` props replaces line under tabs with 3 dots.

<Preview>
  <Story id="molecules-tabs--dots" />
</Preview>

### responsive
`responsive` props makes overall tabs width stretches to container or device width.

<Preview>
  <Story id="molecules-tabs--responsive" />
</Preview>

### tabsMargin
`tabsMargin` props gives margin space between tabs.

<Preview>
  <Story id="molecules-tabs-long-tabs--tabs-margin" />
</Preview>

### tabsPadding
`tabsPadding` props gives padding space between inside a tab.

<Preview>
  <Story id="molecules-tabs-long-tabs--tabs-padding" />
</Preview>

### noGutter
`noGutter` props combines with `tabsPadding` props will nullify left padding of first tab and right padding of last tab.

<Preview>
  <Story id="molecules-tabs-long-tabs--no-gutter" />
</Preview>

## Component Props
